nodes.text: The Coruscant port authority was an Imperial organization responsible for logging shipments to Coruscant. During the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire, Imperial Senator Bail Organa suggested in a letter to Imperial Security Bureau Chief Investigator Axvering that a missing shipment of U-wing transports might have been mislogged by the Coruscant port authority, and that was the reason for the confusion as to the whereabouts of the shipment. Eventually, the U-wing transports reached the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
The Coruscant port authority was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Rebel Files, a canon 2017 boxed set and reference book authored by Daniel Wallace.
